Articles.Content: okay i have another question on the NASA pack. did NASA help with this pack at all? like how did KSP get the permission if they did to use the NASA logo on parts or the names of different systems. if they did work with NASA will we see the KSP team teaming up with them in the future? cause honestly that would be a match made in heaven. NASA could really use the PR support KSP could give them to get more people excited about space again.

You can listen to this: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/258-KSP-Featured-on-the-BigSushi-FM-Podcast

to learn more about how the cooperation with NASA started.
